description: Returns information about an existing workspace.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace to describe.

nested_items.name: workspace
nested_items.description: A structure that contains details about the workspace.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The alias that is assigned to this workspace to help identify it. It does not need to be unique.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the workspace. For example, arn:aws:aps:<region>:123456789012:workspace/ws-example1-1234-abcd-5678-ef90abcd1234.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the workspace was created.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: (optional) If the workspace was created with a customer managed KMS key, the ARN for the key used.

nested_items.name: prometheusEndpoint
nested_items.description: The Prometheus endpoint available for this workspace. For example, https://aps-workspaces.<region>.amazonaws.com/workspaces/ws-example1-1234-abcd-5678-ef90abcd1234/api/v1/.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the workspace.

nested_items.name: workspaceId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the workspace. For example, ws-example1-1234-abcd-5678-ef90abcd1234.
